OOC:Sorry everyone...had to go on a trip last couple days so hav'nt 
been able to post.

BIC: 

::JetV/Slag/Repugnus::
Jetv backs off as the bot tries to fend him off.  He waits for the 
proper time. Just as a little warning slice from the bot then hacks 
at his arm with the chainsaw.

Slag is hit straight on from the missiles in his sheided head.  
"OOOOUUUCCCHH!" he screamed roaoring back on his hind legs and 
letting loose a large blast of flame straight back at the bot who 
fired at him.

Repugnus runs to help this bot he was fighting with earlier  plummet 
the almost sparkless bot to the ground.  He slams his clawed hand at 
the bots head.

OOC:Also everyone, the bum is actually repugnus.  That is what i 
planned when i started this post, but yans character is a drunk i 
believe.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Switchblade detected an attempt on his blind side. Quickly he spun 
through
> the air avoiding the chainsaw. Switchblade now had a bot on both 
sides.
> Keeping an arm on each side he changed his stance to defend him 
from both
> sides. to keep Jet V at bay he'd occasionly use a light swing to 
let the
> opposition know that they hadn't been forgotten.
